# Markdown tables

.pull-left[

```markdown
| Time          | Activity           |
|:--------------|:-------------------|
| 01:00 - 01:50 | Session 1          |
| 01:50 - 02:00 | *Break*            |
| 02:00 - 02:45 | Session 2          |
| 02:45 - 03:00 | *Break*            |
| 03:00 - 03:50 | Session 3          |
| 03:50 - 04:00 | *Break*            |
| 04:00 - 04:45 | Session 4          |
| 04:45 - 05:00 | Wrap-up / Overtime |
```
]
